project_descr: Preparation of an HCFC Phase Out Management Plan (HPMP) - JAM/PHA/55/PRP/24

outputs.output_title: Prep. HCFC Phase out Mgt Plan
outputs.output_descr:
This document describes the proposed institutional arrangements and budgets for the preparation of an HCFC Phase-out Management Plan (HPMP) for Jamaica, which has assigned to UNDP, the responsibility of preparing the HPMP. Such arrangements would need:

a)	To reflect national context and priorities, national policies and country-drivenness and consequently would need the agreement of Jamaica to the proposals contained herein;
b)	To facilitate seamless application of the proposed arrangements to the implementation stage of the HPMP to follow, once it is approved; and
c)	To draw upon the lessons learnt from functioning of institutional arrangements and operational mechanisms employed for the ongoing portfolio of projects under the Montreal Protocol and to the extent possible integrate existing infrastructure.

project_title: preparation of an hcfc phase out management plan for jam
